name: Hudson
description:
Play as Hudson in a 1-bit world as enemy bugs assault your HUD.

Your player character does not take damage directly, but take care to protect your health bar from attackers, and don't let skill thieves steal your skill upgrades.

Try to collect all upgrades to get out.

Controls

  • ATTACK - Left Click
  • BOW & ARROW - Right Click
  • MOVE - W/S/A/D
  • PICK UP & PLACE ORBS - F

Objective

  • Prevent enemies from damaging your health bar
  • Pick up skill gems and insert them into skill upgrades in the bottom left
  • Upgrade all 3 skills for a chance to get out
  • Watch out for "skill thieves" taking your gems out of your upgrades
